attributes.action: Ban all meat food production processes that inflict undue pain and suffering to any animal
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned wish to ban any meat production that inflicts pain and suffering to any animal.
Religious beliefs cannot and must not take precedence over an animals right to be treated humanely in our country.
Make it law to show on the labeling how an animal was slaughtered, if ritually, in the name of a religion, everyone has the right to know how the animal suffered in it's production.
